attributes.action: Lower the mark scheme on the new GCSE system 9-1
attributes.background: Many students are off target and the new system is causing them to be put under a lot of pressure and stress. Teachers always keep repeating on how they "don't know what the mark scheme will look like". Many of us are failing

rejection.details:
Mark schemes are the responsibility of exam boards, not the UK Government or Parliament.

You might like to sign this petition instead:

https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/217889
